author: Bill Birtch
content:
Just curious, but why didn't you just get the bible on Kindle? It can be had for free (I just checked) and what better way to use as a reference guide? Gonna go get me a copy right now. I'm not a christian but can see where it might come in handy having a copy within reach at all times.

And I agree, e-ooks are the way to go for all the reasons you've stated. I seldom buy paper any more unless I pick up something used from the library book store.
